주문 고객

배송지 정보

Opens external website in a new window. Opens in a new window. Opens external website. Customer information - Totême - Checkout

Info

Shipping to Europe
• DPD Standard Home delivery: 2-4 business days, 10 EUR
• UPS Standard: 2-4 business days, 15 EUR
• UPS Express: 1-2 business days, 20 EUR

VAT is included in in the product price.

Shipping outside Europe
• UPS Express Export: 2-4 business days, 20 EUR
• DHL Express Export: 2-4 business days, 30 EUR

Taxes and duties are included in the product price.

Shipping to Russia
Orders shipped to Russia must go through customs controls and clearance procedures upon arrival, which may cause delays.

Any taxes or duties applied by Russian customs will be payable by you. Please contact your local customs office for further details on current import restrictions and duty rates.

Cancellations
Please note, orders need to be canceled within 1 hour.

Shipping information: due to a change of warehouses there may be slight delays in shipping at this time.

We have a 14 day returns policy, from the day you receive your order. This applies to full priced and sale items. Register you return here.

Due to some process updates at our warehouse, we have put some carefully considered, temporary solutions in place to facilitate the returns process for you. This means we are currently providing return labels via email. If you have registered a return, our client experience team will reach out with your return form once your request has been approved. This may cause slight delays in the process – we hope for your understanding.

Exchanges

If you want to exchange an item for a different size or color, please return it and place a new order.

We are available Monday to Friday: 9am – 5pm CET

  • Chat
  • shop@toteme-studio.com
  • +46 8 20 38 20
  • WhatsApp
